footer.description: I build user-focused, high-performance, and accessible digital products with modern web technologies.

home.subtitle: I design and build scalable, high-performance, modern digital experiences across web, mobile, and cloud.

highlights.title: Contributing end-to-end from product discovery to production.
highlights.subtitle: My experience is shaped around modern JavaScript ecosystem, data visualization, cloud-native architectures, and user-centric iterations.

item1.title: Design-Driven Approach
item1.desc: I work closely with design teams and reinterpret interaction prototypes with code. I have built accessible component libraries.

item2.title: Scalable Backend
item2.desc: I have developed high-traffic APIs in serverless, container, and event-driven architectures. I focus on SLA tracking and observability.

item3.title: Team Playmaker
item3.desc: I take an active role in mentorship, code review, and bringing a technical perspective to product strategies. I love strengthening interdisciplinary communication.

zenblog.desc: A high-performance and simple blog engine developed with Go, offering Markdown-based content management.

dinakademi.desc: Modern education platform enriched with interactive tests and video content, based on Vite and Firebase.

mybaby.desc: Modern and functional e-commerce platform developed for baby products, based on MERN stack.

invoice.desc: Smart finance assistant offering invoice scanning with Gemini AI 2.5 Flash and Firebase cloud synchronization.

safepass.desc: Real-time student tracking and security management system we developed with a team of 6.

readingTracker.desc: Modern platform powered by React 19 and Supabase, tracking daily readings.

skills.title: Technologies I trust and use frequently

blog.title: Thoughts on software development and product building.
blog.subtitle: I share experiences and observations about technology, product strategy, and software development.

blogPost.notFoundDesc: The blog post you are looking for may have been moved or is not yet published.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: The link may be incorrect or the content may have moved.
